abstract: Chechnyan leader Ramzan Kadyrov posts Instagram video depicting Russian opposition politician in cross hairs of rifle; former Islamist rebel turned fierce ally of Vladimir V Putin accuses United States of censorship after Instagram deletes post; Russian political opposition is wary of Putin's influence on Kadyrov's increasingly violent bluster.

headline.print_headline: Menacing Video Posted by Chechen Leader Alarms Critics of Putin in Russia
headline.main: Menacing Video Posted by Chechen Leader Alarms Critics of Putin in Russia

snippet: The video, which appeared to show a Russian opposition figure in the cross hairs of a sniper’s rifle, was removed from Instagram because it violated guidelines against threats or harassment, a spokeswoman said.
lead_paragraph: The video, which appeared to show a Russian opposition figure in the cross hairs of a sniper’s rifle, was removed from Instagram because it violated guidelines against threats or harassment, a spokeswoman said.
